name: Sprill & Ritchie: Adventures in Time
summary: Return items to their correct era in Sprill and Ritchie - Adventures in Time, a wonderful adventure across different ages. Ritchie invites Sprill over to check out his latest invention - a time machine. When the machine is turned on, things go awry and items from all different eras of time are misplaced. Now, the young fox cub is on a thrilling adventure to restore the course of history.
